author: Reuters
title: Kazakhstan to shut down most businesses in major cities for a week

author: AP
title: COVID-19 Concerns Mean Astronaut’s Family Can’t Attend His Space Launch
description: Chris Cassidy is blasting into space for six months on April 9, but his wife and kids won't be there because of the coronavirus.
content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) A NASA astronaut whos about to leave the planet for six months will blast off without any family or fanfare because of the coronavirus.
Chris Cassidy said Thursday that he wont have any guests at his April 9 launch from Kazakhstan. … [+3328 chars]

author: Al Jazeera
title: Kazakhstan announces $10bn economic package
description: Government aims to help stave off impact of coronavirus as oil price war between Saudi Arabia and Russia makes it even harder to stabilise economy.
content:
Kazakhstan's government is pumping billions of dollars into its economy to help stave off the impact of the coronavirus.
But the oil price war between Saudi Arabia and Russia is making it harder to stabilise the oil-dependent Kazakh economy.
